item.title: Chrome Extensions for winners
item.description: In the same vein as the toolbox post I put up in March, I wanted to post a list of my most-used Chrome extensions. I don’t use many Chrome extensions, but there are a few that I completely rely on every day. I get asked occasionally what these are and if I could share the links to some of these things, so here’s a list of the best ones.
